alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 11:53PM CDT until June 10 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Phillips County in north central Kansas... Eastern Furnas County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1153 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Arapahoe to near Beaver City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hollinger, Stamford, Long Island and Woodruff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
